== Introduction ==

A simple UI building system to ease the creation and manipulation of UI elements. 

== Goals ==

  * Maximize code reuse
  * Improve UI consistency (centralized and cached templates)
  * Code less, do more

== Methods ==

=== ui.icon ===

{{{
<span class="ui-icon ui-icon-{icon:s}" />
}}}

|| *Option* || *Description* ||
|| icon || Icon id ||

== Usage example ==

=== JavaScript ===

{{{

$(function(){

    $.ui.builder.button({label: "Hello"})
        .appendTo('#demo1');

    $.ui.builder.button({label: "World", icon: 'gear'})
        .appendTo('#demo1');

    $.ui.builder.icon('gear')
        .appendTo('#demo2');

});

}}}

=== Output ===

{{{

<div id="demo1">
    <a href="#" class="ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button">Hello</a>
    <a href="#" class="ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button ui-has-icon"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-gear"/>World</a>
</div>

}}}

{{{
<div id="demo2">
    <span class="ui-icon ui-icon-gear"/>
</div>
}}}
